meanings.definition: Not separated or divided into parts
meanings.sent1: The cake was served as one undivided piece.
meanings.sent2: The undivided attention of the audience was on the performer.
meanings.sent3: The undivided puzzle pieces made it easy to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her undivided loyalty to her team was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The undivided sky stretched endlessly above them.

meanings.definition: Not shared or given to others
meanings.sent1: He kept the secret undivided among friends.
meanings.sent2: The undivided ownership of the house caused disputes.
meanings.sent3: The undivided dessert was all for me to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: Her undivided love for him was evident to all.
meanings.sent5: The undivided responsibility fell solely on his shoulders.

meanings.sent1: The undivided project was ready for presentation.
meanings.sent2: She felt undivided after finishing her meditation.
meanings.sent3: The undivided set of tools made the job easier.
meanings.sent4: His undivided focus on the task led to success.
meanings.sent5: The undivided truth finally came to light.
